channel.title: Cooking Timer [Pi] Original Basic Pi
channel.description:
Can anyone help me to make a cookTimer ? I have tried for a whole day, plz help.
Like How would I make a cooking timer I tried to write my own shit but fails bad and get like 100 errors, can anyone help?
skype:eddie.samoylik

item.title: Cooking Timer [Pi] Original Basic Pi
item.dc:creator: @I_Smoke_Kush I Smoke Kush
item.description:
@I_Smoke_Kush wrote:

[quote=“ohokay, post:2, topic:545511”][code=java]

if (System.currentTimeMillis() - lastCook > COOK_TIMER_IN_MS) {
//cook
lastCook = System.currentTimeMillis();
}
[/code][/quote]

what would I chase the number by the fish ids or what?

Read full topic
